scripts.prepare.docker: cd docker.d && npm i && npm update
scripts.prepare.configure: cd configure && npm i && npm update
scripts.preinstall: npm run prepare.docker && npm run prepare.configure
scripts.log.service: docker exec -it starter-kit pm2 log main/service
scripts.log.main: docker exec -it starter-kit pm2 log main
scripts.log.page: docker exec -it starter-kit  pm2 log main
